> [reichama](#comment_2_19M1Unu2z3j9WyiQ1vcgG6yGnPRmTkUkVe): Hate is the escalation and redirection of love. It is impossible to hate if you do not first love.

I do not agree with you. For example, many christians and jewish orthodox hate members of other religious groups without even knowing them. Some people hates gays even if they do not know any personally. And there are plenty of other examples when hate comes without loving first.
